title: Snow and Ice Removal Requirements
summary: Property owners must clear snow and ice from sidewalks within specified time limits.

sidewalk_requirements.clearance_width: Full width of sidewalk, minimum 36 inches

time_limit.description: Snow must be removed within 12 daylight hours after precipitation ends

ice_treatment.prohibited: Snow/ice cannot be pushed into street

snow_emergency.notification: Via local media, city website, and emergency alert system

parking_restrictions.removal_time: Vehicles must be moved within 3 hours of declaration
parking_restrictions.towing: Vehicles may be towed at owner's expense

snow_emergency_routes.signage: Look for red and white 'Snow Emergency Route' signs

failure_to_clear_sidewalk.description: Each day of non-compliance is separate violation

exemptions: Property owners with documented disability (must request exemption)

salt_request.description: Residents can request salt for steep hills

tips: Clear snow before it compacts into ice
Don't push snow into the street - it creates hazards
Check on elderly neighbors who may need assistance
Keep fire hydrants near your property clear
